Key Match Events: Guard Jordan Hawkins put up his second 20+ point outing on the season as he was called into starting duty
Pre-Game Insights: The Pelicans head back home to begin a four-game homestand on Friday, Nov. 1 with a matchup against the Indiana Pacers
The injury report for that contest will release later in the day
Post-Match Reflections: New Orleans (2-3) dropped a third consecutive game after their 2-0 start on Wednesday with a 104-89 loss at Golden State (4-1)
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans game against the Pacers will be broadcast on the Gulf Coast Sports and Entertainment Network and WWL 870 AM
Check out more broadcast information and for those looking to stream it, be sure to check out Pelicans+
Others: The Pacers are also 2-3 to start the season
Daniel Theis exited the Pelicans game against the Warriors with a right ankle injury
